trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.
trans-unit.target: 提供强类型化连接字符串生成器的基类。

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>, and so on) derive.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder 类提供从中强类型化的连接字符串生成器的基类 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>， <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>，依次类推) 派生。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串生成器使开发人员可以以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串和分析并重新生成现有的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder has been defined in a database-agnostic manner.
trans-unit.target: 已在数据库不可知的方式定义 DbConnectionStringBuilder。

trans-unit.source: Because of the addition of the <xref:System.Data.Common> namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database.
trans-unit.target: 由于添加<xref:System.Data.Common>命名空间，开发人员需要依据他们能够编程以生成可对任意数据库的连接字符串的基类。</xref:System.Data.Common>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the DbConnectionStringBuilder class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider.
trans-unit.target: 因此，DbConnectionStringBuilder 类允许用户将分配任意键/值对，并将生成的连接字符串传递给强类型的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 所有数据提供程序的.NET Framework 的一部分都提供一个强类型的类继承自 DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>，和<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以生成、 分配和编辑连接字符串的任意提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs.
trans-unit.target: 对于支持特定的键/值对的提供程序，连接字符串生成器提供了与已知对相对应的强类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 为了支持需要能够支持未知的值提供程序，开发人员还可以提供任意键/值对。

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder 类实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着在设计时类适用于 Visual Studio 设计器。

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: 当开发人员使用设计器生成强类型化数据集和 Visual Studio 中的强类型的连接时，强类型化的连接字符串生成器类将显示其类型与关联的属性，也将具有可映射为已知键的常用值的转换器。

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 无需应用程序的一部分创建的连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 DbConnectionStringBuilder 类或其强类型的派生类之一生成和修改连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder 该类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以创建连接字符串使用的强类型化的连接字符串生成器类，或者它们可以使用 DbConnectionStringBuilder 类。

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder performs no checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder 执行有效的键/值对的任何检查。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 因此，很可能使用此类创建无效的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>支持仅键/值对的 SQL Server 支持; 尝试添加无效对将引发异常。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A> method and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handle tries to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>方法和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>属性句柄尝试插入恶意项。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码正确转义嵌套的键/值对: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#]``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ```结果是以安全方式处理无效值以下连接字符串︰``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>类，可以选择使用 ODBC 规则来引用值。

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})).
trans-unit.target: 如果`useOdbcRules`是`true`，则此<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>使用 ODBC 规则来用引号括起来 （括起用大括号 （{}） 的值） 的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`useOdbcRules`是`false`，则此<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>使用引号字符 ("") 来分隔值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用 {} 分隔字段;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>使用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加一个具有指定的键和值转换为项<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>属性还可以用于通过设置不存在的键的值在字典中添加新元素。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.
trans-unit.target: 例如：`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。

trans-unit.source: Calling the Add method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: 通过将传递 null 值调用的 Add 方法 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 密钥引发<xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: However, calling the Add method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 但是，通过传递 null 值调用的 Add 方法将键/值对中移除。

trans-unit.source: The key to add to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的键<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 指定的键的值。

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyword为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一种有效而安全的方法，以将一个键和值附加到现有<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>对象。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许开发人员使用<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>创建能够充分利用中包括的功能的键/值对的集合<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>类添加键/值对，而无需会产生的创建和维护开销时<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>实例。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: `AppendKeyValuePair`方法正确设置的键和值的格式并将新的字符串添加到提供<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>要向其中添加键/值对。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的键。

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: 提供的键的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一种有效而安全的方法，以将一个键和值附加到现有<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>对象。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许开发人员使用<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>创建能够充分利用中包括的功能的键/值对的集合<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>类添加键/值对，而无需会产生的创建和维护开销时<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>实例。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: `AppendKeyValuePair`方法正确设置的键和值的格式并将新的字符串添加到提供<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}).
trans-unit.target: 虽然大多数数据源，可以通过使用引号分隔字段，ODBC 不支持-对于 ODBC 连接字符串，你必须使用大括号 （{}）。

trans-unit.source: In order to have the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 为了具有<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>使用 ODBC 规则来分隔字段，请将设置`useOdbcRules`参数`true`。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>要向其中添加键/值对。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的键。

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: 提供的键的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用 {} 分隔字段， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>使用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property is visible in Visual Studio designers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>属性是在 Visual Studio 设计器中可见。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Developers creating designers that take advantage of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员创建利用设计器<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>类必须能够进行的连接字符串，可见或设计器的属性网格中不可见。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The BrowsableConnectionString property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: BrowsableConnectionString 属性，指示该属性，应通过将属性设置为不可见的开发人员可以`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection string is visible within designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果连接字符串设计器中可见;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>否则为。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 清除的内容<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法中移除所有键/值对，从<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>并重置所有对应的属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 这包括设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>属性设为 0 和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>属性为空字符串。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects on the associated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>上关联的对象<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by designers to clear all associated property descriptors on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 设计器使用此方法以清除<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>上的所有关联的属性说明符

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的连接字符串<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回键/值对存储在受支持<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>保留的集合以分号分隔的列表

trans-unit.source: Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign.
trans-unit.target: 每个对包含的键和值，用一个等号分隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个典型的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property.
trans-unit.target: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ```数据访问接口可能会遇到特定键和每个连接字符串属性的值。

trans-unit.source: , These values are documented individually.
trans-unit.target: 分别记录这些值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>虽然，从它继承的类，类将不会验证其连接字符串，与关联的键/值对地</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionString 属性<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>类通常用作用于创建一种机制，并分析以分号分隔的键/值对的列表以等号分隔。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了任何验证或其他特定于连接字符串的支持。

trans-unit.source: If you add items to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> collection, the ConnectionString property will reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将项添加到<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>集合，ConnectionString 属性将反映所做的更改。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to the ConnectionString property, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters.
trans-unit.target: 如果将值分配给 ConnectionString 属性<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>将尝试分析使用分号和等号分隔符的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前的连接字符串中，从中包含的键/值对创建<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.target: 已提供无效的连接字符串自变量。

trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>包含特定键。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要查找中的键<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares the connection information in this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object with the connection information in the supplied object.
trans-unit.target: 将在此连接信息进行比较<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>中提供的对象的连接信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 密钥名称的比较不区分大小写;值的比较是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The EquivalentTo method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order.
trans-unit.target: EquivalentTo 方法返回`true`的键/值对是否相等，而不考虑其顺序。

trans-unit.source: The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 因为顺序并不重要连接字符串中，两个连接字符串的连接行为是等效的。

trans-unit.source: However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不同的顺序可能会影响连接池行为的基于这些连接字符串的连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 固定大小的集合不允许添加或删除元素后的集合在创建，但它允许修改现有元素。

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 固定大小的集合只是一个集合使用的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.target: 当前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索与提供的键从此相对应的值<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to first call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: TryGetValue 方法允许开发人员安全地检索的值从<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>而无需首先调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: TryGetValue 不会引发异常时调用它，传递中不存在的键，因为你不必在检索其值之前查找键。

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用具有不存在的键 TryGetValue 将 null 值 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的项的键。

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to the `key`.
trans-unit.target: 值对应于`key`。

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyword 在连接字符串中，找到否则为。

trans-unit.source: keyword contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyword包含一个 null 值 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含中的值<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中的值的顺序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>未指定，但它是中的关联键顺序相同<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>返回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the values in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>不是静态的副本; 相反，<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>引用回原始<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>中的值</xref:System.Collections.ICollection></xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，更改为<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>反映在<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含中的值<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
